settings.label: License Key
settings.info: Paste above your unique license key. It's located inside the zip file that you downloaded when you purchased the theme. No license yet? Buy one for 1, 3 or 10 stores [here](http://konversiontheme.com/).

settings.content: Tip: license key might end with ==, make sure you copy the whole string

options.label: Product reviews by shopify. Enable the app. You still need to [install the app](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews).
Loox - Photo Reviews. Enable the app. You still need to [install the app](https://apps.shopify.com/loox-fashion-reviews).
Yotpo Reviews, Photos, and Q&A. Enable the app. You still need to [install the app](https://apps.shopify.com/yotpo-social-reviews).
Ryviu. You still need to [install the app](https://www.ryviu.com/).

settings.label: Learn how to get your app key [here](https://desk.zoho.com/portal/tabarnapp/kb/articles/konversion-integrates-with-yotpo).
Display a special instructions field (checkout note) inside the cart drawer
Enable floating image animation
settings.info: This animation appears when you add a product to the cart.

settings.label: Primary
settings.info: Used for text links and buttons

settings.label: Secondary
settings.info: Used for highlighted elements and call to action buttons

settings.label: Add to cart button background color
Add to cart button text color
Inversed Background
settings.info: Used for contrast sections. Tip: choose dark color if your background is light

settings.label: Inversed Text
settings.info: Used for text and buttons inside contrast sections

settings.content: To edit the text in the '404 Not Found' page go to Admin Panel > Online Store > Themes > Theme-Konversion > Actions > Edit Languages
To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: To add the countdown offer to a product, just tag your product with 'countdown-{days}-{hours}-{minutes}'. Eg. countdown-0-2-30 the timer will end in 2 hours and 30 minutes. [Watch the gif](http://g.recordit.co/5hFvZjEL0u.gif)

To display a product in the deal of the day widget, tag it with 'deal-yyyy-mm-dd'. This product will appear as the deal of the day on the date that you picked (eg. deal-2017-05-10). You can tag more products and add more than one tag to the same product. Note that if you have too much 1st level menu items, the widget might not fit in the navigation bar.

settings.label: Enable deal of the day
settings.info: If you are not using any deal-yyyy-mm-dd tag in your products, you should disable this feature. Leaving it enabled may cause a performance drop.

settings.label: Main text
settings.default: DEAL OF THE DAY ENDS IN

settings.label: Favicon
settings.info: 64x64 px .png recommended

settings.label: Fixed header
settings.info: Header stays fixed to the top of the screen, when you are scrolling

settings.content: Product card is an individual item in product lists such. Example: products on collection page, featured products, related products etc.

settings.label: Hide long product title
settings.info: Use fade out effect for text that doesn't fit so product cards have equal height

options.label: 1 row - fade out the rest of text
2 rows - truncate the rest of text

settings.label: Add margin (mobile version)
settings.info: Adds empty space between a product card and edge of the screen

settings.label: SEO title for password page
settings.info: Default is shop name

settings.label: Custom scripts
settings.info: This code included at the bottom of the page on each page load. Note: you need to wrap it with <script>your_code_here</script> tag if this is JavaScript code

settings.label: Days until popup is displayed again

settings.content: To test the popup feature click on 'Test Mode' checkbox bellow.

settings.label: Add first name field in the form
Text (optional)
settings.default: You can write the headline and text for your newsletter popup in the theme settings (Newsletter section). You can also control how often the popup is displayed or disable it entirely.

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.info: Default is shop description, product description or article description
